form.attribute: Please confirm that you are not a script by entering the letters from the image.

Thanks!

Your feedback helps me make this a better module.

If you'd like to contribute to the future development of FormBuilder, you can make a donation below. I will be happy to give donors credit as a sponsor in the FormBuilder help. Every bit helps!

options.option:
Someone's Testing a FormBuilder Submission!

Form Name: {$sub_form_name}
Date of Submission: {$sub_date}
Your server: {$sub_host}
IP address of person using form: {$sub_source_ip}
URL of page containing form: {$sub_url}
Modules you'll be using together: {$modules_you_ll_be_using}
What will you personally be doing on your CMS MS site?: {$what_will_you}
Where are you from?: {$where_are_you_from_}
Do you have any comments / feedback for me?: {$do_you_have_any}

Thanks for trying out FormBuilder. You can use this form to provide me with feedback about how you will be using Form Builder, so I can best allocate resources for future development. Thanks, ___Samuel___

field.field_name: What will you personally be doing on your CMS MS site?
